name: Sonoma County Job Link
description: Free career counseling, training, and employment services for Sonoma County residents
fullDescription: Sonoma County Job Link is the America's Job Center serving Sonoma County, offering free employment services to job seekers and businesses.
whatTheyOffer:
- Career counseling and assessment
- Job search assistance and workshops
- Resume and interview preparation
- Skills training programs
- Youth employment services
- Veteran services
- Connection to local employers
howToGetIt:
1. Visit Sonoma County Job Link in Santa Rosa
2. Register and complete assessment
3. Meet with career counselor
4. Access training and employment services
keywords: Sonoma County, Job Link, workforce, AJCC, America's Job Center, Santa Rosa, job training, career services
